items.sentence: I don't plan to do that until Tom tells me to.
As I told you before, I don't plan to do that.
If you did that, it would ruin our friendship.
I'd like to hear the reason that you did that.
I didn't know Tom wasn't the one who did that.
I think that now isn't a good time to do that.
This is the book that I bought three days ago.
This desk is too big to fit through that door.
These things are and always will be arbitrary.
I'd like to have someone like that in my life.
